subject: Olympic Games (2020)
lead_paragraph: Jacques Rogge, the president of the International Olympic Committee, said he would be “delighted” if the United States bid for the 2020 Summer Games, despite the recent stinging rejection of American cities.
snippet: Jacques Rogge, the president of the International Olympic Committee, said he would be “delighted” if the United States bid for the 2020 Summer Games, despite the recent stinging rejection of American cities.
